short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compute the GPTSyncScore : correlation percentage between orginal text and final text generated by chatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance transparency in communication with the GPTSyncScore Chrome extension. This tool allows you to assess the impact of ChatGPT on your original text by calculating a correlation percentage between the original and the post-ChatGPT generated text.

ðŸš€ Key Features:

âœ… Correlation Calculation: Evaluate the correlation between your original text and the text generated with ChatGPT. The percentage provides insights into how much the generated content aligns with your initial input.

âœ… Copy to clipboard: automatic copy to clipboard on clicking on the GPTSyncScore button

âœ… Promoting Transparency: Foster transparency in your communication by understanding the impact of ChatGPT on your messages. The correlation percentage serves as a quantitative measure of alignment.

âœ… Usage Guidance: Easily input your original and ChatGPT-generated texts, click the "Calculate" button, and receive instant feedback on the correlation percentage. Additionally, the result can be copied to the clipboard for further reference.

Why Use GPTSyncScore?
Gain a deeper understanding of how ChatGPT influences your communication. Whether you're drafting emails, creating content, or engaging in online conversations, this extension empowers you with insights to ensure transparency and authenticity in your written interactions.

Note:
This extension is designed to provide users with a tool for assessing the correlation between their original text and text generated with ChatGPT. It aims to enhance awareness and understanding, promoting responsible and transparent use of language generation technology.
